programme.title: It's Always Sunny In Philadelphia Yr 15
programme.desc: Guided by a young priest, Mac spends a day at the seminary to truly understand what it takes to become a priest. Dennis and Frank plan an elaborate trap at the castle to humiliate Charlie's pen pal. Dee prepares for a date with an Irish doctor, only to find herself sinking in a bog.

programme.title: Frogger
programme.desc: The worldwide megahit Frogger franchise hops to life like never before in an outrageously fun, new physical competition series based on the beloved and iconic 1980s video game from Konami. Hosted by Damon Wayans Jr. and Kyle Brandt, "Frogger" invites contestants from across the country to test their physical prowess and problem-solving skills on a variety of epic and imaginative obstacle courses filled with challenges from the classic game.

programme.title: Bake Off: The Professionals S1
programme.desc: The remaining teams take on a secret recipe challenge as well as a chocolate showpiece inspired by the theme of the four seasons, requiring huge feats of patisserie skill.

programme.title: The 95th Annual Academy Awards (Highlights)
programme.desc: The 95th Academy Awards ceremony, presented by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences, will honor the best films released in 2022.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S3
programme.desc: Nature is a tempestuous beast, capable of destruction on a level so devastating it has claimed the lives of millions. Using incredible archive and footages, We'll relive these weather spectacles, revealing very personal stories of people who have captured the entire event.

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth
programme.desc: This landmark six-part documentary series charts the planet's most spectacular events of migration, rebirth and transformation. Over the course of a turbulent year, we witness how finely tuned creatures face the Earth's seasonal patterns. However, in the 21st Century these patterns are becoming more extreme, less predictable and dangerously unreliable. From Asia to Europe, Africa, Australia, North and South America - we witness the drama & the spectacle.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst Evolution S2
programme.desc: Valt Aoi, who participated in the Japanese Championship, was scouted for the prestigious Spanish team BC Sol and heads out to Spain. With their sights set on the world, Valt and his friends begin their challenge for the World League!

programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Mandarin) The Miniforce fight against Villains threatening the Earth! Our heroes Volt, Max, Sammy and Lucy come back with upgraded X-power!

programme.desc: Cherry teaches Ollie and Sloppy how to play the piano. The boys have to face the music when they excitedly paint Cherry's piano their favourite colour - blue! The gang tries to learn how to play the harmonica but instead discovers Sloppy's hidden talent.

programme.title: Counting With Paula S4
programme.desc: The children dare each other to do stuff. It's all fun and games, until a dare goes too far. Billy is hesitant to try new things. Will this cause Billy to miss out on something that could be really awesome?

programme.title: Kingdom Force
programme.desc: Kingdom Force follows the thrilling, fast-paced exploits of five mighty animal heroes as they serve and protect the citizens of five unique animal kingdoms. Led by the fearless wolf, Luka, this team has a carnivorous appetite for danger and thrills and there's no operation they can't pull off with the help of their giant rescue robot, Alpha-Mech. Whatever the problem, big or small, these heroes come together to work as one - Kingdom Force Unite!

programme.title: The School Bell Rings S2
programme.desc: It's time for the National Drama Championships. A bus has been booked to take the students to the venue. But in a turn of events, the gang misses the bus and the bus breaks down midway. Panic ensues. Will anyone make it to the finals?

programme.title: On The Red Dot - Undiagnosed
programme.desc: (Encore) Atira suffers a relapse of fits. Will it derail her family's travel plans back to India? And twins Dzakir and Dzakwan may finally get an answer to what's plaguing their medical condition.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: (Encore) Steven Chia becomes a food delivery rider and discovers how incentives, tied to platform algorithms, can make or break their daily income.

programme.title: Crimewatch 2023
programme.desc: (Encore) Loanshark Network: In our 2023 season premiere, officers from the Criminal Investigation Department work their way up the chain to cripple an unlicensed moneylending syndicate! Scam Advisory: Hazelle Teo hits the streets to share the tricks behind loan scams and how we can safeguard ourselves from becoming victims.

programme.title: Grand Designs: House Of The Year S6
programme.desc: Join Kevin McCloud, Michelle Ogundehin and Damion Burrows for an exclusive look at the extraordinary new homes competing for the 2021 RIBA House of the Year award. Over four one-hour specials, we explore the inspiration and stories behind these builds. Categories include houses that take us by surprise, homes that reinvent a popular style, problem-solving homes and homes that showcase exceptional materials and craftsmanship.

programme.title: Masterchef Australia S11

programme.title: The Wall UK S4
programme.desc: The Wall is a wildly unpredictable, fast and simple game show with huge cash sums on the line. Two players must work together to tackle the mammoth four-storey-high wall. Emotions run high as the pair's faith in one another is tested by unpredictable outcomes and ever-rising stakes. The rules are simple. If the players answer a trivia question correctly, the ball turns green as it falls randomly down the wall towards slots of varying cash amounts.

programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: The staff at GFPCH think Poh Choo is favouring Geraldine because they are related. Heng is livid when Lee Yue signed an exclusive deal with The Crown Coffeeshop and the neighbouring coffeeshops to sell her herbal tea. Nooraini tells Khatijah she should make a move on Faizal.

programme.title: The Algorithm
programme.desc: Evan secretly consults The Institution and claims there was no mistake in the initial pairing. As he finds out the new pairing is unchangeable, he is left with no choice but to face the consequences of his own doing.

programme.desc: 第二天的早晨，Amir为文杰制作了简单的早餐Kuih Qasidah，一种北方马来人的传统食物。接着Amir带着文杰乘船来到旁边的原始森林翻山越岭寻找这一棵 Tualang Tree， 希望可以看到树顶上的银蜂窝。离开Pedu Lake 后，文杰来到了Jitra小镇路边的一间小店，这里有着在网络上出名的Roti Canai Sarang Burung，一个鸟窝形状的煎饼搭配着马铃薯咖喱。而老板只是一个25岁的年轻人 ，他的姑姑也在里头制作着马来传统的食物 Roti Pek Nga。走着走着，我们发现Jit.

programme.desc: Life is idyllic in the wetlands and lakes of the Singapore Botanic Gardens. A white-breasted waterhen faces his biggest challenge while orphaned lesser whistling ducklings are given a second chance.

programme.title: Ramadan Pertama Edi
programme.desc: Edi will celebrate his first Ramadan with his pregnant wife, Nad at his father-in-law, Pak Sobri's house. However, he is nervous as he has not been in Pak Sobri's good books ever since his eventful online wedding solemnisation. Problems arise when Edi has trouble fasting and hides the truth from the family, including Nad. At the same time, Nad's family secrets begin to unveil one by one.Ep synopsisEdi is anxious to visit Nad's family as he is still traumatised by his o.

programme.title: Rahsia Rasa
programme.desc: This cooking show features five segments. In each episode, the chef will bring instafamous as a guest who will share their recipes and cook together with the host.

programme.title: Mencari Puspawangi
programme.desc: A culinary competition show involving two celebrities representing the state they come from. Both contestants will be required to prepare the favourite Royal dish where they will be judged by the host and representatives from the palace.

programme.title: Sis Stars Hotel
programme.desc: Lily, Natasha and Bell meet their lawyer to state their terms and conditions before signing the contract. Lily and Natasha want their husbands to be involved in the hotel affairs. At the same time, Bell is confident that her fiancé will bring in the most profit to the company.

programme.title: Takdir Yang Tertulis
programme.desc: Azlan drops the bomb on Juweta and announces his intention to divorce her via social media. While everyone gossips about the couple in the office, Ruhila confronts Azlan. He blames her for what had happened.

programme.title: Hard to Heart
programme.desc: An interview program with well -known artists, about their ups and downs in their involvement in entertainment industry.

programme.title: Yang Dulu
programme.desc: This show unravels the real life stories and journeys of iconic figures struggling in the creative and art industry. The audience will find opportunity to preview an exclusive' insider story never made known to the public.

programme.title: Satukan Rasa
programme.desc: Indah Suhaila finds herself in an awkward situation when she suddenly becomes a personal assistant and a vocal coach to Jai Bakri, a popular male singer who has an extreme stage fright. They go through a journey together to find out what it takes to be a singer and a performer.Episode 1Indah is a widow who works as a party service coordinator. She meets Jai, a student who struggles with anxiety. With Indah's help, Jai becomes an overnight internet sensation.

programme.title: Jalan Jalan Ramadan
programme.desc: The series narrates host, Harris Alif's fascinating adventures in various Malaysia states to learn the traditions and cultural uniqueness of the village visited.

programme.title: Oh Mummy! Mas Idayu

programme.desc: The series tells the story of Ara and Aris and their grandfather Aki, who tells his grandchildren tales that feature kancil, a mouse-deer popular in Malaysian folklore, and various other animal characters such as crocodile, buffalo and monkey.

programme.title: Wassup Bro?
programme.desc: Wassup Bro? features Alif Satar as the host of the show who will share his own first hand experience, learning and mastering 13 different types of extreme sports around Malaysia namely motocross, drifting, paragliding, rock climbing, diving and manymore.
